author: chirino
msg: In cases were pub sub is used with large numbers of consumers / producers and destinations, the number of routing sessions can grow really fast.  lets shutdown sessions once they are idle for over 2 seconds.

author: gawor
msg: GERONIMO-6319: A fix for 'The resources have not been resolved' error when resolving fragment bundles

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3911: Replicate after startup option would not replicate until the IndexWriter was lazily opened.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2622 Modified the Agent to check the state of a process before deciding which one to kill due to a low swap space
